title: Tarot
writer: Spenser Cohen, Anna Halberg, Nicholas Adams
actors: Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley, Jacob Batalon
plot: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against...
